name: dirndl

(also dirndl skirt) a wide skirt tightly gathered (= pulled into folds) at the waist
CrazyD/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a dress with a skirt like this and a tight bodice (= top part), as worn, for example, in parts of southern Germany and in Austria
